Text: How do i put this in my DS??

This is successfully working on the R4DS.  If you don't have an R4DS, you can get one cheap here:
http://www.dealextreme.com/products.dx/category.604

It does not mess up anything! You need to have at least firmware 1.10 running for it to work properly.
